title: Reborn Cute Wifey: Mister, Hug Me - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Resurrection   Revenge   Strong to Stronger
author: Lord Qian   钱爷
description:
Reliving a new life, Ye Guanguan worked herself into frenzy plotting ways to approach Lu Jinting.

Out of her expectation, this cold abstinent man changed to a “sex-obsessed beast” and did all he could to dote on her!

After Ye Guanguan finished off all her scum enemies, she confessed to him, “Mister Lu, I married you because I regarded you as a tool for my revenge!”

Raising his eyebrows, this man embraced his cute wifey who wanted to leave, “But I’m not done with it. You haven’t made full use of me.”

“What do you mean?”

“I still have other functions waiting for you to exploit!” Saying that, he directly fell over her!>
